articles.author: A. Pawlowski
articles.title: Flu season 2020-2021: Flu activity is at historic lows with mask-wearing - TODAY
articles.description: How to prevent the flu naturally: Flu activity is unusually low, the CDC flu activity map shows, as people wear masks, social distance to prevent COVID-19.
